entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Highvale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
